data.name: s1
data.value: (i) Ibandakanya ezimbini ukuya kulo naliphi na inani leerakah. Elona xesha lilungileyo lokwenza le salah kukwisiqingatha sesithathu sokugqibela sobusuku, kwaye wenze iSalah yaseWitr emva koko.

data.name: s10
data.value: (ii) I-niyyah ye-Salah ye-Tahajjud ihamba ngolu hlobo lulandelayo:

data.name: s11
data.value: Bismilla hirahma nirrahim Nawaitu usalli rak'atini sunnata salatit-tahajjud lillahi ta-ala {Egameni lika-Allah, uSozinceba, uSozinceba. Ndizimisele ukuthandaza (imijikelo) emibini yomthandazo weTahajjud ngenxa ka-Allh Osenyangweni.}

data.name: s12
data.value: (iii) Cengceleza kwirak’ah nganye iFatiha kunye nayo nayiphi na iSurah okanye iivesi zeKur’an.

data.name: s13
data.value: (iv) Yenza le dua ilandelayo emva koko:

data.name: s14
data.value: Allahumma lakal-hamdu, anta qaiyyumus-samawati wal ardi wa man fi hinna. Wa lakal-hamdu anta malikus-samawati wal ardi wa man fi hinna. Wa lakal-hamdu anta nurus-samawati wal ardi wa man fi hinna. Wa lakal hamdu antal-haq, wa wa'duka haq, wa li-qa-uka haq, wa qauluka haq, wal-jannatu haq, wan-naru haq, wan-nabiyyuna haq, wa Muhammad, sallallahu alaihi wa sallama haq, was-sa’atu haq. Allahumma laka aslamtu, wa bika amantu, wa alaika tawakkaltu, wa ilaika anabtu, wa bika khasamtu, wa ilaika hakamtu. Faghfirli ma qaddamtu wa ma akh-khartu, wa ma asrartu, wa ma a'lantu, wa ma anta a'lamu bihi minni. Antal-muqaddimu wa antal-mu-akh-khir. Lailaha- illa anta, wa la haula wa la quwwata illa billah.

data.name: s15
data.value: {Egameni lika-Allh, uSozinceba, uSozinceba. Owu Allah! Lonke ukubonga ngakuWe. Wena unguMlondolozi wamazulu nomhlaba nako konke okukuwo. Lonke ukubonga ngakuWe. Wena unguMlawuli wamazulu nomhlaba nako konke okukuwo. Lonke ukubonga ngakuWe. UluKhanya lwamazulu nomhlaba nako konke okukuwo. Lonke ukubonga ngakuWe. Wena uyiNyaniso, idinga lakho liyinyaniso, ukuhlangana nawe yinyaniso, amazwi akho ayinyaniso, iJannah yinyaniso, uMlilo yinyaniso, abaProfeti bayinyaniso, uMuhammad (uxolo nentsikelelo). ka-Allh makabe phezu kwakhe) yinyaniso, iyure iyinyaniso. Owu Allah! Ndiyazithoba kuWe, Ndiyakholwa kuwe, Ndithembele kuWe, Kuwe ukubuya kwam, Ndimoyisa kuwe umchasi wam ngengxabano, Ndibheke kuwe ukuba ndigwebe. Ndixoleleni ngezinto endizenzileyo ngaphambili, nendiza kuzenza kwixesha elizayo, endizifihlayo nendizityhilayo; kwaye konke oku ukwazi bhetele kunam. Wena unguLowo wenza inkqubela yaye unguLowo ulibazisa. Akukho Thixo wumbi ngaphandle kwakho. Kwaye akukho mandla namandla ngaphandle koAllh.}

data.name: s2
data.value: (ii) Phambi kwe-niyyah, yithi ngalinye kula maxesha ali-10 alandelayo:

data.name: s5
data.value: Subhanallahi wa bihamdih {UAllâh Ukhululekile kuko konke ukungafezeki, kwaye yonke indumiso iya kuYe.}

data.name: s6
data.value: Subhanal quddus {Ikhululekile kuko konke ukungafezeki yiNgcwele kaNgcwele.}

data.name: s8
data.value: La ilaha illallah {Akukho thixo wumbi ngaphandle koAllh.}

data.name: s9
data.value: Allahumma inni a’udhu bika min diqid dunya wa diqi yaumil qiyamati {O Allah! Ndifuna ukhuseleko lwaKho kumnyanzelo weli hlabathi nakuMnyanzelo weLizayo.}
